meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Stocks Fall on Fed Comment Stocks fell after the Fed chairman, Ben S. Bernanke, hinted that policy makers were in no hurry to lower interest rates.
BUSINESS DAY, PAGE C3
Basques End Cease-Fire A Basque separatist group called off a cease-fire and vowed to resume its battle against Spain.
PAGE A6
Not Like Mama Made The meatball is now the star of some menus, made with fine ingredients and techniques.
DINING, PAGE F1
A Virtual Dollhouse New interactive sites, like Stardoll.com, are aimed at young users, especially girls.
PAGE C1
Shuffle at HBO HBO shuffled its management in the wake of the departure of its chief executive, Chris Albrecht.
